segments.text: I'm looking closely at all the little details in this drawing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way the water sheet flows over the cabinet doors is quite striking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like a tiny, indoor waterfall, surprisingly rhythmic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the fact that the woman's drying a plate while standing in it is just wild.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: You can see the stacked dishes to her right, waiting their turn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then there's the cookie jar, a beacon of delicious temptation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's posture, stretched out, one hand in the jar, the other with a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's a master of stealth, almost.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the girl, with her raised, open palm, just anticipating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their teamwork is really quite impressive, for a clandestine operation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a snapshot of pure, unadulterated childhood mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost taste those cookies from here.
segments.speaker: PAR
